languages.text: {n}Хмыкнув, Соломон отвечает на объятия.{/n} "Спасибо. Я постараюсь быть для тебя этим сильным человеком".
{n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."
languages.original_text: {n}Хмыкнув, Соломон отвечает на объятия.{/n} "Спасибо. Я постараюсь быть для тебя этим сильным человеком".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."
{n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."
{n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."
{n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."
{n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous rend votre étreinte en poussant un petit rire.{/n} « Merci. J'essaie d'être fort pour vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous rend votre étreinte en poussant un petit rire.{/n} « Merci. J'essaie d'être fort pour vous. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはくすりと笑いながら、その抱擁に応えた。{/n}「ありがとうございます。あなたのために、強い男でいられるよう努力します」
languages.original_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはくすりと笑いながら、その抱擁に応えた。{/n}「ありがとうございます。あなたのために、強い男でいられるよう努力します」

languages.text: {n}Entre risas, Solomorne te devuelve el abrazo.{/n} «Gracias. Intentaré ser el hombre fuerte que ve en mí».
languages.original_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre risas, Solomorne te devuelve el abrazo.{/n} «Gracias. Intentaré ser el hombre fuerte que ve en mí».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙轻声笑了起来，回应着你的拥抱。{/n}“谢谢你，我会努力成为你眼中的那个强者。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙轻声笑了起来，回应着你的拥抱。{/n}“谢谢你，我会努力成为你眼中的那个强者。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, hafifçe gülerek sarılmana karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Senin için güçlü olacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne hafifçe gülerek sarılmana karşılık veriyor.{/n} "Teşekkür ederim. Senin için güçlü olacağım."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne erwidert die Umarmung mit einem Lachen.{/n} "Danke. Ich werde versuchen, dieser starke Mann für Euch zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}With a chuckle, Solomorne responds to the embrace.{/n} "Thank you. I'll try to be that strong man for you."
